english.segment1: Holy Uncreated One. Your beauty fills the skies. But the glory of Your majesty. Is the mercy in Your eyes
english.segment2: And Worthy Uncreated One. From heaven to earth come down. You laid aside Your royalty. To wear the sinner's crown
english.segment3: And, O Great God, be glorified. Our lives laid down, Yours magnified. O Great God be lifted high. There is none like You
english.segment4: Jesus, Savior, God's own Son, Risen, reigning Lord. Sustainer of the universe. By the power of Your word
english.segment5: And, O Great God, be glorified. Our lives laid down, Yours magnified. O Great God be lifted high. There is none like You. There is none like You. There is none like You
english.segment6: And when we see Your matchless face. In speechless awe we'll stand. And there we'll bow with grateful hearts. Unto the Great I Am
english.segment7: And, O Great God, be glorified. Our lives lais down, Yours magnified. O Great God be lifted high. There is none like You. There is none like You
